import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import Card from '@mui/material/Card' import CardContent from '@mui/material/CardContent'; import { Avatar, Typography, Box } from '@material-ui/core' function Weather() { const [weather, setWeather] = useState([]) const [condition, setCondition] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { axios .get('https://api.weatherapi.com/v1/current.json?key=1fb6df188b0143648c5223702212409&q=belmont ma&aqi=yes') .then(response => { setWeather(response.data.current) setCondition(response.data.current.condition) }) }, []) return (
Local Weather Belmont, MA { weather.temp_c }Â°c { condition.text } Wind MPH: { weather.wind_mph } Humidty: { weather.humidity }%
) } export default Weather /* */
